title: Coil - 21 Albums
description:
What can I say about Coil except that every time I come back to them it turns into some sort of immersion bender that can last anywhere from dusk to dawn or an entire weekend.  Probably one of the most challenging yet satisfying avant electronic pop experimental collectives I've ever heard.  Essential for fans of Pete Namlook, Cabaret Voltaire and the ambient/cosmic side of Bill Lasewell.

The albums are:
 
A Guide for Beginners- A Silver Voice
A Guide for Finishers- A Golden Hair
And The Ambulance Died In His Arms
Astral Disaster
Backwards
Black Antlers
Black Gold (Collected Rarities)
Black Light District - A Thousand Lights In A Darkened Room
Constant Shallowness Leads To Evil
Horse Rotorvator
Love's Secret Domain
Musick to Play in the Dark 1
Musick to Play in the Dark 2
Mutek 2003
Queens of the Circulating Library
Scatology
Seasons Winter Solstice Bonus 2001
The Snow EP
Thread Remixes
Time Machines
Worship The Glitch

Enjoy and please seed!;-}

Junco
